content.question: If f is a continuous function and if F'(x)=f(x) for all real numbers x, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 1 to 3 of lowercase f of open parentheses 2 times x close parentheses with respect to x equals"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </munderover> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaamOzaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIXaaapaqaa8qacaaI ZaaaniabgUIiYdGccaGGOaGaaGOmaiaadIhacaGGPaGaamizaiaadI hacqGH9aqpaaa@4147@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="one half times F of 3 minus one half times F of 1"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaacaWGgbGaaiik aiaaiodacaGGPaGaeyOeI0YaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbi aaikdaaaGaamOraiaacIcacaaIXaGaaiykaaaa@404D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="one half times F of 6 minus one half times F of 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaacaWGgbGaaiik aiaaiAdacaGGPaGaeyOeI0YaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbi aaikdaaaGaamOraiaacIcacaaIYaGaaiykaaaa@4051@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
